name: Vung Tau- Wonderful place for Relaxation, Enjoy sightseeing and Understand Vietnamese Culture & Tradition
description: + Enjoy the sight seeing,i'll lead you to whenever you wanna go even in the middle of nowhere :) + Understand Vietnamese culture. + Eat good food,our traditional food,drink.+ Have you ever seen one of the most beautiful and unique Temple in Viet Nam? Night market ?christ the redeemer statue in Viet Nam....You'll experience all of it Seeing is believing,it's time to go.
